translated: With ignorance as condition there is a (volitional) process rooted in ignorance. With a (volitional) process rooted in ignorance as condition there is consciousness rooted in ignorance. With clinging rooted in ignorance as condition there is existence rooted in ignorance. With existence rooted in ignorance as condition there is birth rooted in ignorance. With birth rooted in ignorance as condition there is ageing and death rooted in ignorance.
